description: '''Rock Against Communism''' ('''RAC''') was the name of [[white power]] rock concerts in the United Kingdom in the late 1970s and early 1980s; it has since become the catch-all term for music with racist lyrics as well as a specific genre of rock music derived from [[Oi!]] The lyrics can focus on racism and [[antisemitism]]; however, this depends on the band.

mixes.note: You're on your own with finding a mix for this.
